thread.title: Grammys 2017: Watch Bruno Mars & Morris Day Pay Tribute To Prince - Stereogum
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: Watch Bruno Mars & Morris Day Pay Tribute To Prince - Stereogum

author: Gabriela Tully Claymore
title: Grammys 2017: Watch Bruno Mars & Morris Day Pay Tribute To Prince - Stereogum
text:
Gabriela Tully Claymore @gabrielajunetc | February 12, 2017 - 11:05 pm Share < br />this article: CREDIT: Kevin Winter/Getty Images 
Bruno Mars and Morris Day took us back to the ’80s tonight when they paid tribute to Prince on the Grammy stage. Day opened the set with “Jungle Love” before breaking into “The Bird.” Then, Mars took the stage to perform “Let’s Go Crazy” in a purple suit à la Purple Rain . Watch clips below.
